verbose_text: In this study, the results showed that p53 interacted with SIRT1 in the different experimental groups, the p53 expression was downregulated while the ratio of acetylated p53 was upregulated in the L-arginine-induced mice with ANP, suggesting that the SIRT1 activity was significantly decreased in the mice with ANP, while resveratrol could enhance the SIRT1 activity in the mice with ANP.
